nodes.text: The DarkStryder fire creature was a piece of DarkStryder technology employed by the bounty hunter Mist on the alien construct within the Kathol Rift. Contained within a silver-white metallic cord, the fiery apparition was twenty meters tall and twenty meters wide, and contained a monstrous face within its flames. The creature was immune to blaster fire, but it was only temporary, and dissipated after a few minutes. The creature was controlled by the cord, which Mist wore on her arm.
